lines.text: My God, Henry, what you've done... it's satanic!
If you kill me, you'll be killing Henry Jekyll!
You don't understand, do you? Jekyll deserves to die - he's the one who's responsible, not you.
Gentlemen, have you ever contemplated the horror of eternal damnation?

[chuckling]
Well, not in terms of myself, no!

[very serious]
Then do contemplate it - in terms of Henry Jekyll.
